SEARCH

Class StartGame

java.lang.Object
StartGame
All Implemented Interfaces:
ActionListener, EventListener
public class StartGame extends Object implements ActionListener
Represents the start menu for the Connect Four game. Allows players to enter their names and select their token colors before starting the game.

  • Field Summary
